BIO

I am a multi-faceted and accomplished engineering student currently studying at Vellore Institute of Technology with a keen interest in sports, technology, and music. I am very passionate about Blockchain-oriented projects as well as AI/ML-oriented subjects and projects and have been an active participant in courses and events which are centric on these subjects. I have a strong belief that, in terms of results and objectives, I have a very enthusiastic and decisive work ethic and I carry out any work with conviction and dedication.

2021 - Current

Wharf Street Strategies

MERN Stack & Blockchain Developer

I spent a two-month tenure at WSS, Navi Mumbai where I got a chance to work on my Web Dev and Blockchain skills and fine-tune them to an industry standard.

2020 - Current

VIT Today

Technical Coordinator

VIT Today is the in-campus newsletter of our university. During my tenure here, I was responsible for maintaining the website and social media accounts of our chapter. I was also responsible for singlehandedly managing the SEO of the content we put up and manage operation on a weekly basis.

2020 - Current

TEDxVITVellore

Event Coordinator, (Volunteer)

I got a great chance to interact with some like-minded people during my tenure as an Event Coordinator for TEDxVITVellore. We successfully organized over 6 events which made us one of the most popular TEDx collge chapters in India.

2020 - Current

Entreprenurship Cell, VIT Vellore

Operations Executive, (Volunteer)

I got a great chance to interact and brainstorm with some like-minded people during my tenure as an Operation Executive for Entreprenurship Cell, VIT Vellore.
